name: Trippi Troppi
description: A circus acrobat who flips; tumbles; and confuses with dizzying moves.

name: Trullimero Trullicina
description: A master of comedy and confusion; this trickster uses laughter as both shield and sword.

name: Tung Tung Tung Sahur
description: A rhythmic drummer whose beats can heal allies or leave foes reeling.

name: Brr Brr Patapim
description: A frosty foe who brings the chill of winter to every battle. His icy strikes are as cold as his heart.

name: Burbaloni Luliloli
description: A bubbly spirit who attacks with popping bubbles and soothes with foamy waves.

name: Capuccino Assasino
description: A caffeinated menace; quick and relentless. His espresso shots pack a punch!

name: Tralalero Tralala
description: A flamboyant singer whose voice can both heal and harm. Beware the discordant notes!

name: Ballerina Cappuccina
description: A graceful dancer whose pirouettes can dizzy and delight. Her elegance hides her strength.

name: Bobombini Goosini
description: A bombastic troublemaker who loves explosions and chaos. Watch out for the smoke!

name: Bobrini Cocococini
description: A coconut-wielding wild one; smashing and splashing with tropical chaos.

name: Bombardino Crocodilo
description: A swampy crocodile with a tail that whips and a grin that confounds. Don't get too close!
